level.heading: Qualifications of members.
level.text: Members of the Advisory Neighborhood Commissions which are established pursuant to the provisions of this part shall:
Be nominated in the manner prescribed in § 1-309.05(b); and

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 1-72
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 1-72, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 1-309.31.
